mapper.insert: insert into Departments (title, department_head_id, hospital_id) values (#{department.title}, #{departmentHeadId}, #{hospitalId})
mapper.select: select d.id, d.title, w.id as ward_id, w.number, w.floor, p.first_name, p.last_name, p.age, p.diagnosis from Departments d left join Wards w on d.id = w.department_id left join Patients p on w.id = p.ward_id
